forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High 18C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 67F. SE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming cloudy with occasional light rain late. Low around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers along with windy conditions. High 19C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 67F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low around 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 66F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 67F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
